name: microdrop-3.0
description: Microdrop with MQTT support and Web UI

scripts.dev-mode: npm run uninstall-pkgs && npm i packages/microdrop-async packages/device-controller
scripts.dev-mode-all-windows: @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy unrestricted -Command " Get-ChildItem .\packages\* | Foreach { npm --prefix $_.fullname run prod-mode } "
scripts.build-all-unix: npm run install-all-unix && npm run --prefix ./ui/src build && find ./packages -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d -exec npm --prefix {} run build \;
scripts.build-all-dev-unix: npm run install-all-unix && npm run --prefix ./ui/src build && find ./packages -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d -exec npm --prefix {} run build-dev \;
scripts.build-all-windows: npm run install-all-windows && npm run --prefix ./ui/src build && @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy unrestricted -Command " Get-ChildItem .\packages\* | Foreach { npm --prefix $_.fullname run build } "
scripts.build-all-dev-windows: npm run install-all-windows && npm run --prefix ./ui/src build && @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy unrestricted -Command " Get-ChildItem .\packages\* | Foreach { npm --prefix $_.fullname run build-dev } "
scripts.link-all-unix: find ./packages -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d -exec sh -c "cd {} ; npm run-script link-packages" \;
scripts.link-all-windows: @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy unrestricted -Command " Get-ChildItem .\packages\* | Foreach { cd $_.fullname ; npm run link-packages } "

author: Lucas Zeer
